title: Fritz or Thor? American’s AR Immersive Hot Shot heats up Turin
description: They say lightning never strikes twice. Perhaps Taylor Fritz disagrees. The American’s sizzling hitting against Alex de Minaur features in the latest Nitto ATP Finals Immersive Highlight, which aims to help attract a younger audience and present ATP tennis in a new and innovative way during the 2024 season finale. Thanks to a combination of Augmented Reality technology, 3D modelling and live data, fans can enjoy a baseline barrage from Fritz that ends with a forehand thunderbolt! [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Taylor Fritz's relentless baseline hitting features in the latest Immersive Highlight, which aims to present ATP tennis in a new and innovative way during the 2024 Nitto ATP Finals.

American’s AR Immersive Hot Shot heats up Turin World No. 5’s fierce forehand was Thursday’s Immersive Highlight November 15, 2024 Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour Taylor Fritz in action at the 2024 NItto ATP Finals. By ATP Staff They say lightning never strikes twice. Perhaps Taylor Fritz disagrees. The American’s sizzling hitting against Alex de Minaur features in the latest Nitto ATP Finals Immersive Highlight, which aims to help attract a younger audience and present ATP tennis in a new and innovative way during the 2024 season finale. Thanks to a combination of Augmented Reality technology, 3D modelling and live data, fans can enjoy a baseline barrage from Fritz that ends with a forehand thunderbolt!

AR Immersive

Fritz or Thor? American’s AR Immersive Hot Shot heats up Turin

World No. 5’s fierce forehand was Thursday’s Immersive Highlight

November 15, 2024

Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour

Taylor Fritz in action at the 2024 NItto ATP Finals. By ATP Staff

They say lightning never strikes twice. Perhaps Taylor Fritz disagrees.

The American’s sizzling hitting against Alex de Minaur features in the latest Nitto ATP Finals Immersive Highlight, which aims to help attract a younger audience and present ATP tennis in a new and innovative way during the 2024 season finale. Thanks to a combination of Augmented Reality technology, 3D modelling and live data, fans can enjoy a baseline barrage from Fritz that ends with a forehand thunderbolt!
